text: Maiṅ apnā hāth un nabiyoṅ ke ḳhilāf baṛhā dūṅgā jo dhoke kī royāeṅ deḳhte aur jhūṭī peshgoiyāṅ sunāte haiṅ. Na wuh merī qaum kī majlis meṅ sharīk hoṅge, na Isrāīlī qaum kī fahristoṅ meṅ darj hoṅge. Mulk-e-Isrāīl meṅ wuh kabhī dāḳhil nahīṅ hoṅge. Tab tum jān loge ki maiṅ Rab Qādir-e-mutlaq hūṅ.
